Your Path to Brighter Minds & Better Days

Welcome to Over the Rainbow: A Journey to Healing and Hope. Just as rainbows emerge after storms, we believe that brighter days are possible for everyone.

Join us as we explore resources, support, and guidance to help you navigate life's challenges. Together, we'll navigate the storms and celebrate the rainbows.

Quote of the Week

“There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.”

John Green
